Title: BatchItAll
Description:
BatchItAll

BatchItAll is an IDE designed to create .bat files easily. Its many features include a selected text editor, a color picker, a switch making dialog, preloaded code snippets, a reading feature, a testing feature, and much more.

Some features are unfinished. They will be finished soon, after the next major release.

There are some minor bugs and all, and I will try to fix them up.

BatchItAll IS NOT DEAD!

I am not finished. Currently, I am adding a syntax-highlighting and editing control to the project.

Expect another release in a month or two.
